testcase.name: Navigate to the Sign in page
Navigate to the Sign up page
Creating a new valid user account

failure.message: failed Creating a new valid user account

testcase.failure:
Scenario: Creating a new valid user account
Given I am not logged in Given the group "registered" exists Given I am on the User Sign up page When I submit a valid email, password and password confirmation Then I should see a success message for new account And I should be logged in
Message:
Unable to find button "Register" (Capybara::ElementNotFound) ./features/step_definitions/user_steps.rb:72:in `/^I submit a valid email, password and password confirmation$/' features/users.feature:29:in `When I submit a valid email, password and password confirmation'

testcase.name: Creating an invalid user account with duplicate email

failure.message: failed Creating an invalid user account with duplicate email

testcase.failure:
Scenario: Creating an invalid user account with duplicate email
Given an account for "user1" already exists Given I am not logged in Given I am on the User Sign up page When I submit the User Sign up page with email "user1@user1.com" and password "password1" Then I should see a failure message for "duplicate email" And I should be logged out
Message:
Unable to find button "Register" (Capybara::ElementNotFound) ./features/step_definitions/user_steps.rb:81:in `/^I submit the User Sign up page with email "([^\"]*)" and password "([^\"]*)"$/' features/users.feature:37:in `When I submit the User Sign up page with email "user1@user1.com" and password "password1"'

testcase.name: Creating an invalid user account with non-matching password confirmation

failure.message: failed Creating an invalid user account with non-matching password confirmation

testcase.failure:
Scenario: Creating an invalid user account with non-matching password confirmation
Given I am not logged in Given I am on the User Sign up page When I submit a valid email address and non-matching password and password confirmation Then I should see a failure message for "password mismatch" And I should be logged out
Message:
Unable to find button "Register" (Capybara::ElementNotFound) ./features/step_definitions/user_steps.rb:91:in `/^I submit a valid email address and non\-matching password and password confirmation$/' features/users.feature:44:in `When I submit a valid email address and non-matching password and password confirmation'

testcase.name: Creating an invalid user account with too short password

failure.message: failed Creating an invalid user account with too short password

testcase.failure:
Scenario: Creating an invalid user account with too short password
Given I am not logged in Given I am on the User Sign up page When I submit a valid email address and too short password and password confirmation Then I should see a failure message for "too short password" And I should be logged out
Message:
Unable to find button "Register" (Capybara::ElementNotFound) ./features/step_definitions/user_steps.rb:100:in `/^I submit a valid email address and too short password and password confirmation$/' features/users.feature:51:in `When I submit a valid email address and too short password and password confirmation'

testcase.name: User signs in with valid credentials
User signs in with invalid credentials
A user should be able to edit their details
A user should be able to cancel their account
A user should be able to recover their password
A user should be able to provide a profile image url
A user should be able to use gravatar for a profile image
A user should be able to remove their profile image
A user provides an invalid profile image url
